channel.title: Quick Help
channel.description:
I recently changed
[code] return new URL("127.0.0.1:" + (80 + anInt958));[/code]
to
[code]return new URL("joshserver.servepics.com" + (80 + anInt958));[/code]
and now I get the below error, I was just trying to change the IP that the client connects too is there a different way to do so?
[code]Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.NullPointerException at java.applet.Applet.getCodeBase(Unknown Source) at client.getCodeBase(client.java:7438) at client.method19(client.java:352) at client.method84(client.java:5907) at client.method140(client.java:10426) at client.method7(client.java:2049) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:119) at client.run(client.java:4493) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code]

item.title: Quick Help
item.dc:creator: @H_tler HÂ¡tler
item.description:
@H_tler wrote:

I recently changed

 return new URL("127.0.0.1:" + (80 + anInt958));

to

return new URL("joshserver.servepics.com" + (80 + anInt958));

and now I get the below error, I was just trying to change the IP that the client connects too is there a different way to do so?
